definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: older name of Hebron; po/liv Arbo(k), Kar(i)aqarbok, etc. (prob. = fourfold city (otherwise Jos 14:15, Jos 15:13, Jos 21:11), v. esp. GFM);—Jos 14:15 (JED), Ju Jdg 1:10 b ([[אַרְבַָּע]] ´[[ק]]:), also Ge 23:2, Jos 15:13, Jos 15:54, Jos 20:7, Jos 21:11 (all P); ´[[הָא]] :´[[ק]]: Ge 35:27 (P) Ne 11:25.—Vid. [[חֶבְרוֹן]]. p. 289
